We compare these aforementioned three notions of K𝐾K-SSO.
From their definitions, we conclude readily that: 1) K𝐾K-SSO in Definition 2 implies K𝐾K-SSO in Definition 1, but the converse is not true; 2) K𝐾K-SSO in Definition 1 implies K𝐾K-SSO in Definition 3, but the converse is also not true.
